All For One.NAME: All for One
All For One.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Fetch all 0 cost cards from your discard pile

Hologram.NAME: Hologram
Hologram.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Fetch a card from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Hologram.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Fetch a card from your discard pile.

Secret Technique.NAME: Secret Technique
Secret Technique.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Skill from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Secret Technique.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch a Skill from your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Skills NL in my draw pile.

Secret Weapon.NAME: Secret Weapon
Secret Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Fetch an Attack from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Secret Weapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch an Attack from your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Attacks NL in my draw pile.

Seek.NAME: Seek
Seek.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Seek.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
